snippet: The film, written and directed by Quentin Dupieux, stars Alain Chabat, Jonathan Lambert and Jon Heder.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie Reality, directed by Quentin Dupieux and starring Alain Chabat.
lead_paragraph: The film, written and directed by Quentin Dupieux, stars Alain Chabat, Jonathan Lambert and Jon Heder.

headline.main: Review: ‘Reality,’ an Absurdist Comedy of Dreams and Movie Nightmares
